website_summaries.verdict: Whether your lashes are thin, short, pale, or all of the above, this mascara does it all – makes them appear thicker and longer while delivering awesome color.
pros: Volumizes and lengthens lashes, so it's almost like 2 formulas in one
Makes lashes feel soft and look "feathery."
Color is richly pigmented, and buildable if you want a bold, dramatic look
Stays put until you take it off
cons: Mixed opinions on the brush – some users love it, others found it too bulky
A few reports of itchy, irritated eyes after using it

customer_reviews.title: BEST waterproof mascara EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Losing my lashes 3 yrs ago due to chemo, I never thought I'd be able to bulk up my pathetic lash regrowth. Ive got a makeup bag full of mascaras I need to combine to make me look like I have lashes. This product is a miracle, for me as you can,tell in picture!
customer_reviews.author: Traci D. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I think these pictures pretty well speak for themselves. But if I had to add to it I would say that this is one of the best mascaras I have ever tried. A definite dupe for two face better than sex mascara. The first application in my opinion gives nice length and if you apply a second coat it gives you nice volume as well. The pictures are with two coats. I have worn it all day on multiple occasions with no flaking. I have purposely left it on overnight and there was the smallest amount of flaking but still looked amazing even after a full 24 hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Crouch

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER MASCARA!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since, getting this mascara, I have wondered why I did not discover it earlier. I am not being paid to write this. I am 53 years old and have used many a mascara in my life. It is simply the best, best product I have ever used!! It gets every single lash on the first try. It literally builds them with the brush on the first coat. I have called so many friends letting them know-this is the ONE, Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I bought this mascara in black and loved it---finished it and needed a new tube
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara in black and loved it---finished it and needed a new tube. I bough the mystic black because it was $1 cheaper--and I wanted to see if was darker or lighter than the regular black. This formula is completely different---it gets everywhere all over my eyelid which the first tube never did. Also it smudges and creates raccoon eyes within a few hours of wear. It terrible to have black smudges everywhere. I like the mascara---I just dont recommend the mystic black.
customer_reviews.author: Shayda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I was really curious about this bc I’ve been BTS loyal for years and this is supposedly the dupe. It’s decent- no BTS, but definitely the best drugstore mascara I’ve used, hands down. I don’t find it to be a great volumizer but it’s lengthening game is amazing. Also lasts through the work day with out flaking or smearing.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Schindler

customer_reviews.title: I removed the mascara and my eyes instantly felt better and redness/itching went away
customer_reviews.text: I tried this mascara on for a day but my eye became incredibly itchy and read all day. I thought it was seasonal allergies and took a bunch of allergy meds. It didn't help until my eyes couldn't take the watering and redness. I removed the mascara and my eyes instantly felt better and redness/itching went away. I am not sure if the mascara is just very strong or has a strong chemical in it. But I have never had that reaction with mascara​ before and wear mascara everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: ❤️AWESOME PRODUCT!!❤️
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried this mascara I used it over the L’Oréal Eyelash Primer and it ended up thick and gross (I’m a fan of separated lashes, not lashes that are so stuck together it looks like you have 7 fat lashes on one eye lol!). I was mad that I purchased this and tossed it in a drawer. A few days later I gave it another try with no primer and WOW!!! It’s AMAZING! In just 2 coats I had the length and volume I love! This picture is with no other makeup so you can get a better feel of how Lash Paradise looks. This is my new favorite mascara!!
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Smudges, Irritates Eyes
customer_reviews.text: It’s a no for me. I thought I would try out this mascara since it had so many positive reviews. The first thing that I noticed was the mascara clumped on the wand - the first time I used it. Secondly, my eyes were irritated all day long. Thirdly, I went to workout and ended up with black smudges all around my eyes and flakes of mascara underneath my contact lenses. I washed it off and took out my contacts and I’m still sitting here with irritated eyes. I will go back to my previous mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Think Positive Be Positive

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced is that you?
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a look-alike for the Too Faced mascara. Seems to perform the same and has a ~similar~ wand. Also added bonus, I got 3 mascaras in my box. Pretty good deal considering one goes for this price in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G

customer_reviews.title: Not smudge free
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews, looking for a smudge free mascara as I have yet to find one that doesn't smudge below my lower lashes. This one claimed to be smudge free. I put it on and within an hour I had black flecks below my lower lashes making it look like I was very tired, or dark circles under my eyes..........very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kerdog

customer_reviews.title: It applied pretty thick and made my lashes look longer (but what ...
customer_reviews.text: This mascara was just ok at first. It applied pretty thick and made my lashes look longer (but what mascara doesn't do that?). However, pretty quickly, the stuff got very clumped up on the brush so when I apply it, it makes my lashes stick to each other and look way too thick and grossly clumped with mascara. I don't like the brush/wand because the bristles are short so it's easy for the product to gunk up, leaving not much length of bristle left to comb the lashes. I don't recommend it and won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P

customer_reviews.title: My experience was not that wonderful. It transferred to my under eye almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, I purchased this after watching a trusted YouTube makeup guru who raved about it. My experience was not that wonderful. It transferred to my under eye almost immediately. Then continued to smudge throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This has quickly become my absolute favorite mascara. Lashes look so lush and beautiful, but not fake overly done. The formula feels so light, almost like it's whipped. It doesn't run at all throughout the day and washes off very easily. My only complaint is that it seems like it dries out quicker than other mascaras I've used. And once it gets a bit dry it can be clumpy. Otherwise it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kimchee

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst mascaras I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the hunt for the holy grail of mascaras and when I heard all the hype about this mascara I had to try it out. I absolutely hated it. It was super waxy. When I tried to put on more than one coat it made my lashes into one triangular lashy wax lump. I don't know if there was something wrong with the one I got or what but I definitely did not have anything at all good looking happen with this mascara. I threw it away after probably 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Stop listening to YouTubers trying to perpetuate FOMO
customer_reviews.text: It's great for people who need extra length/volume and who don't care about the sacrifices you need to make to use this stuff. The bottle contains too much product; it gets everywhere and is goopy, you have to constantly wipe of large globs from the wand--then it drys around the screw top and it's hard to open. The formula looks a bit like spider-legs to me. The formula is very matte, which to me makes it look too synthetic. I need at least a bit of reflectiveness in a mascara, you know, so it looks like it could possibly be an eyelash and not just black putty.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly difficult to remove. Intense eye irritation.
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it looked when I was wearing it, but even after using makeup removal wipes (specifically for waterproof mascara), and two different types of face wash, there was still product on my eyelashes. As I've seen other reviewers mention, my eyelashes started falling out when I was trying to remove the mascara. The product really irritated my eyes (I've never had a reaction like this to makeup before), and even though it's been over 24 hours since I FINALLY got almost all the mascara off, I'm still experiencing pretty significant irritation. I woke up this morning with puffy and swollen eyes and don't know when I'll be able to wear mascara again. Throwing out the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Washable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I got the both the washable and the waterproof mascara. I loved the washable one so much that I got the waterproof one because I thought the look would be just as good and last longer with waterproof since I tears a lot but i got slightly disappointed. Here’s why Washable mascara Nice silky volumes Extended long lashes looking No crumbs Long lasting but not water proof Waterproof -No volumes shows -Hard to apply -Doesn’t have that eyelashes extend look -Black enough for the black lashes -It crumbs up if you put more than 2 layers but one layer not enough -hard to remove, even with make up remover - smudge free - waterproof - long lasting
customer_reviews.author: kalee Li

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced better than sex dupe!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're by looking for a Too Faced BTS dupe, this is it! The mascara blew my mind!!! I barely have any lashes and they are short. This made my eyelashes look full and long!
customer_reviews.author: jmarambula

customer_reviews.title: Goes on like asphalt...
customer_reviews.text: this mascara, although advertised as going on smooth, has the consistency of asphalt complete with gravel. Looks like a clumpy mess. I tried to use it 3 times, cleaning off the brush carefully each time -- yuck. don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McGyver

customer_reviews.title: It does flake.
customer_reviews.text: I have long lashes that are very fine and have been looking for a mascara that will make them look fuller, doesn’t cost a fortune, and does what is advertised. This is a reasonably priced mascara. It is easily removed with soap and water. It does flake after a few hours. It also needs replacing every 2-3 weeks because it dries out. While not the best mascara I’ve ever used it works well enough I guess. I will continue to try others. L’oreal used to have a really good mascara Lash Out, this one doesn’t work nearly as well unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: H. R.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Cancelled my subscription to this
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say this was a dried out mascara. It was hard to apply because there was hardly any on the brush. Very disappointed. Cancelled my subscription to this.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Lady

customer_reviews.title: Even with primer and a clean face. . .ended up below my eyes in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Granted it doesn't claim that it actually remains on eyelashes; but I made an assumption that this would be the case. I purchased the primer suggested for this mascara (and it was great. . .for other mascaras I own). After applying primer and allowing it to dry to clear, I lightly applied the mascara and allowed it to dry. Before I finished my hairstyle, large clumpy flakes of black mascara had already fallen under my eyelid. Clearly, this is not the brand for humid states or weddings that might leave you misty-eyed. In the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Gardening on my knees

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible mascara, too thick and clumpy also the brush is too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Worst mascara I’ve used in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Wore it once and doubt I’ll ever wear it again. Too much product on the wand. It gave great length but the volume was lacking with the first application and just looked clumpy with the second. My bottom lashes were a totally mess. But worst of all it was VERY flaky. I just took it off after about five hours of wear. I don’t tend to have sensitive eyes, but my eyes are so irritated right now. I’ve been wearing L’Oréal Double Extend for years and this one experience is making me want to go right back to tubing mascara.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phifer

customer_reviews.title: really waxy
customer_reviews.text: When i pull the brush out of the tube, the entire brush is covered in the product. i apply it to my lashes and then i have to continue brushing to distribute the product onto my lashes. yeah, sure, this is how you apply mascara, but i've never had to do so much work to put it on. once i'm done, it looks good... nothing like the ads, but then i don't have professionals applying it for cameras. i've used better mascaras, and may not buy this again. it does give volume, but doesnt curl.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Helps the stubby thin lashes but not really the almond shaped hooded eyelid
customer_reviews.text: I have very stubby thin lashes, almond shaped eyes & hooded eyelids that tear intermittently throughout the day. Good - definitely created volume. Although slightly chunky needed to go back w/ my trusty baby tooth brush to thin out some chunks. Bad - took my time but still got mascara on my eyelid & lower lash line from applying to my lower lashes. Good - maybe w/ more practice I'll get more length. Also, it's been a very long while since I've used mascara so I didn't search hard for my lash curler w/c could've "probably" helped the length factor. Picture shows my right eye w/ L'Oreal Voluminous Lash Paradise & left eye is natural.
customer_reviews.author: mjsm

customer_reviews.title: Worst L'Oreal mascara I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have used L'Oreal Voluminous mascara for years and love it. I periodically like to try new things they come out with. This stuff was terrible, it was thick ,clumpy and dry all at the same time, and made a big clumpy mess at the top of the tube. Made my lashes clump together and then it was flaky. The tube was dried out and needed to be thrown away after not very long of time, seemed like it probably lasted 1/3 the life of what the original Voluminous does, and it cost more. Won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: unk1234

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad it took me 34 years to find this mascara but so glad we finally met. I paid out the nose for my last “4D” mascara that was all smudgy by mid day. This stuff blows it away. I stays and it stays and it stays. I can almost wear it 2 whole days. I’m embarrassed to say I’ve already slept in it a couple times and caked some more on in the morning....it’s sooooo good.
customer_reviews.author: @Landryslunches

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: SUPER THICK! i do not like how hard it makes the lashes and they tend to glue together, horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Chic

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!  My new favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky with mascara and this has been hands down the best one I have found. It really extends and thickens my lashes, does not create raccoon eyes at all throughout the day and does not flake. I was having a problem removing the stuff at the end of the day until I discovered the oil pulling technique. Mix a little castor oil with another light oil, such as sunflower and put it on a cotton wipe. Hold it on your closed eyes for 20 or 30 seconds and then wipe off. It removes every last trace AND the castor oil conditions your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: LuvMyKindle

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for people with lots of lashes who want drama. Not ideal for sparse Asian lashes.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara applies very thickly, too thick for my sparse Asian lashes. Because I use Latisse, I have decently long lashes but the wide and dense traditional bristles dump way too much no matter what I do. I even tried using a different brush but to no avail. The formula is too thick and heavy for my taste but If you have nice thick lashes, I think this mascara is all the eye makeup you need. On my small asian eyes, it looks overdone. Also I had a lot of trouble removing it at the end of the day. I tried double cleansing and follow it up with some miscellar water but I still had remnants.
customer_reviews.author: Eye Heart Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Clumpsville population 0
customer_reviews.text: I heard such great things about this mascara. My eyelashes must be different because this mascara made them clump. BUT they did look fuller. I went to work confident with my voluminous eyelashes and hadn’t noticed that the mascara was bleeding slowly throughout the day leaving me with raccoon eyes. I didn’t even have eyeliner on! It was so bad everyone at work thought I was getting the flu. I’m going back to YSL - pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: nickpar21

customer_reviews.title: Really thick
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so thick, either that or mine was old. It did plump up my lashes and make them longer but between the thick brush and the thick consistency of it I found it kinda hard to apply. I kept getting it on my skin around my eye, and it wasn't easy to just wipe away. Once I got past that part it seemed to be ok, no flaking off or smudging. Not sure if I would order it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using L’Oréal voluminous mascara and voluminous butterfly mascara for many, many years (since I can Remember) and love them both. On the other hand L’Oréal lash Paradise has to be (hands down) the worst mascara I’ve used in my lifetime. It’s nothing advertised. The wand come out of the bottle caked with mascara that is impossible to scrape off , clumps are beyond horrible, and doesn’t give you full lashes. Lashes come out in masses of clumped together lashes. I use a lot of L’Oréal products , so I’m not saying it’s a bad company, just this mascara was a huge miss.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality or old product delivered
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the product quality I received. I have used and liked this mascara and decided to order the double pack. The product I received was either old or defective. It was dry and clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: AB713

customer_reviews.title: My New Standby
customer_reviews.text: I adore this mascara and am now giving tubes to friends. I can't speak to its volumizing properties (my lashes are stick straight, I have to curl them) but this stuff locks that curl in place ALL DAY LONG and makes my lashes look amazing! I follow another reviewer's suggestion and drag one side of the wand on the side as I draw it out, otherwise there's way too much product on the brush to use multiple coats. Even before I learned that trick, I loved this stuff. I use the target brand waterproof makeup remover to take it off and will never go back to my old brand!
customer_reviews.author: AndiSchu

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very clean and not clumpy even after 3 coats. You definately dont need tht much though. I just have really short lashes and wanted to see how long I could get them. It seems to hit each lash and make them all longer. I have compared two loreal brands. Ill show the pictures with one, two and three coats of each. The left side (in the photos) is the pink loreal Paris and the right (in the photos) is the loreal origional voluminous. Ill stick to the pink lash paris! Sorry i didnt clean up my eyelid as i went! The last photo is the original loreal!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of 2 mascara's I received a bottle of KidSafe sniffle stopper! ***UPDATED*** Contacted Amazon customer service and they corrected and I received the next day. I have used L'Oreal mascara for many years. Started with the Voluminous Waterproof, then Million Lashes this past year and decided to give this a try. So far I really like it and you don't have to do as many coats.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dupe for monsieur big
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I’m s volunixing mascara junkie and but dozens a year at different price points. I loved Lancôme’s hypnose until Monsieur Big came out. My drug store stand by has always been voluminous. The paradise is better than voluminous in that it not only adds tons of volume, but lengthens. Doesn’t clump and stays on all day (the regular lasts line the waterproof) I bought two new tubes and wire Monsieur Big on one eye and Paradise on the other. They are the SAME but the L’Oréal version is cheaper. (L’Oréal and Lancôme are affiliates). And I’m pretty sure hypnose is voluminous.
customer_reviews.author: AlexiaR

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all... the brush is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all...the brush is all different sizes and angles and because of this it glops on my lashes and then I end up with it falling off my lashes throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara, but soooo messy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best mascaras that I've tried. It makes my lashes look amazing! My only problem is that it gets very messy. Not sure why but the product builds up so bad around the top. If I don't take a tissue and clean off the wand before closing it gets all over everything. I've purchased three separate times and it's happened each time. I keep my mascara in my makeup bag and it's gotten all over all my other makeup and ruined my bags. Such a shame because this really is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: L B

customer_reviews.title: Very clumpy in the tube
customer_reviews.text: This is a good color, waterproof (difficult to remove) and I like the brush contour. It is the first mascara I've used that does not run onto my eyes at all. Even if I cry, or eyes tear from allergies. I use coconut oil to remove it and that works well though. However, it is very clumpy and seems dried up? It makes me think it won't last long. Maybe it is "old" ?
customer_reviews.author: LoveReading

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff to build up thin lashes that stay put❣️
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mascara ❣️ I usually only buy mascara that's waterproof, but this mascara...though it doesn't say it is waterproof..is. When I work out I sweat profusely and with sweat running in my eyes and down my face I don't get racoon eyes...it stays out and is difficult to remove with micellar water or even coconut oil. Finally I found my Estee Lauder eye makeup remover and...Wala..it worked! This is great stuff to build up thin lashes...I love it❣️
customer_reviews.author: Donnalee W.

customer_reviews.title: DO IT NOW!!❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with two faced better than sex mascara and this is a wonderful dupe. I saw a review for it online and didn't really believe it but now I'll never spend $25 for a mascara again. Perfect amount of length and buildable volume. Also the one shape is ideal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Graham

customer_reviews.title: I love the volume
customer_reviews.text: I love the volume. Hate the clumping :( it takes some work to fix the clumps, and nothing, I mean NOTHING completely removes the mascara that I have found yet. I use it, as I love the length and volume it creates, but it has it’s downfalls and the search for a mascara that works the way falsies flared used to work continues. I’m going to try straight coconut oil next to remove it. I’ll ley you know how it goes. If you’re looking for a mascara that doesn’t go anywhere, this one is it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jones

customer_reviews.title: These were old and dried up.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that these were dried up, didn’t even get to use them more than 3 times, so dry it was flaky, little pieces kept getting stuck in my lashes then would go in my eye.. I’ve used this line for the last 2 years with zero problems when I purchased from Walgreens. Sending out expired products is not cool..
customer_reviews.author: Dubuque Diane

customer_reviews.title: IT LASTS.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I like this mascara over all others is because it actually lasts. At the end of the day, I don’t have black circles under my eyes from the residual. It’s waterproof and it doesn’t come off when I take a shower; I need to actually scrub it off. It makes my lashes look HELLA long to the point where they hit the lenses of my glasses (and I don’t even have long lashes). Don’t waste your money buying Anastasia or Clinique mascara!! This is the best makeup product I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Cannot believe ANYONE likes this stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst mascara I've ever used, but close. Thick, clumpy, and the application brush is especially awful. Even wiping the excess off the brush first doesn't help. It applies in a thick gooey mess, your lashes are stuck together and you have to brush half of it out of your lashes with a clean brush to even get it to look halfway decent. The only reason I gave it a star at all is that it does last throughout the day ... which may or may not be a good thing, depending on how successful you were at getting it to look decent in the first place. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Realist

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Natural Look
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying this mascara after my other kind was sold out. I am pleasently surprised with the quality of this mascara. It lasts all day without flaking and it washed off easily with just water in the shower. The main thing worth mentioning is that this definitely lengthens but it does not thicken your lashes. This is because the mascara gives a much more natural look. I would definitely buy this kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin and Katie

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this as I do not like paying high $$$ for mascara. But I will say that the ONE reason I can’t give this more stars is because it made my lashes feel hard and crunchy. The pricier brands do not do that. I used L’Oréal voluminous exclusively for 10+ years. I then tried Dior show and was given a sample of too faced better than sex. Well they aren’t expensive without cause. I really wanted to like Lash Paradise bitnits just alright. I should update after a few weeks and the product dries out a little more, maybe?
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mascara for only a month and it is already dry. It actually started to dry since week 3. I can't use it anymore. It clumps on top. It does flake off and smuges. The only good thing is that it came with two of them. I wouldn't buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: eris sulce

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my regular kind was out of stock (thanks COVID!) I wanted to love this, the price was comparable to what I normally pay and a friend recommended it. It was great the first couple of times I used it, but then it became super clumpy. Luckily my regular L’Oreal voluminous (black tube) came back in stock and I picked one up and tossed this. L’Oreal definitely makes great products, but this isn’t one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Big gloppy mess!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why I had such a bad experience with this product after reading so many glowing reviews, but this is worthless to me. It's as if the neck of the bottle doesn't scrape any mascara off the wand. It comes out so full of mascara that you can hardly see the bristles - like I just dunked it in a pot of thick paint. There's nothing "feathery" about it. Attempted to use three times (even tried completely rinsing the wand and starting fresh), but no luck. It's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best OTC mascara out there
customer_reviews.text: This has the same appearance and brush as a very well know and very over priced high end brand. I will dare to say it's the same quality for 1/3 of the price. I tried this after hearing some buzz about it on beauty blogs and youtubers, so I figured it was worth a try. I've always been a fan of the original L'oreal Volumizing so I thought this might be good. It was great! The brush is amazing and makes a lot of the difference in the application. My lashes respond very well to this mascara. It doesnt flake or smudge on me. Love it and will continue to buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: MakeupartistJen22

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy mystic black
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product twice and was very happy with it. I ordered it again and was very disappointed. Clumpy and flaked.After going through the reviews I read one that she had been happy with it then ordered mystic black. She had the same problem. I ordered blackest black in waterproof this time and again was very happy with it. I do not know if the mystic is a different formula but I will stick with the blackest black. It gives nice volume and length without clumping. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Denise springer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! DUPE for NAME brand Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is hands down a DUPE for Too Faced Better Than Sex! Ladies, buy this now! This is coming for a girl that uses high end makeup and ever since I had my baby and became a stay at home mom I needed to find dupes for my norms (which I can’t afford anymore). This mascara gives same length and drama as the Better Than Sex brand. Only downfall is that it really sucks to take off unless you have eye makeup remover, which I totally recommend you get.
customer_reviews.author: dian.her.

customer_reviews.title: Um.... no.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand all these good review unless they have just never really had a good mascara. Unless I got a bad batch, this is a knock off. This stuff is horrible. Gloppy, gloopy mess. The brush is so fat that you can’t get in the corners of your eyes without getting it all over your skin. And putting on more than one coat without having tarantula leg eyelashes is almost impossible. Save your money and get L’Oreal telescopic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as good as reviews say
customer_reviews.text: i bought this on a review in some magazine (don't remember which one, as i receive many). I have difficulty finding mascara that stays on all day w/out causing raccoon eyes. this did cause that. I also have very slight lashes. People raved about Maybeline great lash and mega blast, which gave me the same look. Have been a huge fan of cover girl for its' lasting, non-running formula, but i never found one of its' products to fill my lashes. So- here's my new favorite, found in a drugstore, and on sale: Revlon Volumazing.
customer_reviews.author: dgolden

customer_reviews.title: Length and Thickness
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara. Goes on thick, but not clumpy. Extends the lashes, again with no end clumps. The brush is soft and "squiggly" -- meaning, it coats well between the lashes besides adding length. Nothing cheap about the tube or feel of the brush. I bought the waterproof type, and it is indeed waterproof. Lasts all day, even in heat, humidity, rain, and scrunch - up - the - face laughing and smiling. Recommend removing with a gentle makeup remover, but if you forget, this mascara will last overnight, too. (I also purchased another L'Oreal mascara to try at the same time (with the Butterfly effect) and after experimenting, this Paradise type worked much better for me.)
customer_reviews.author: HappyInTheWoodsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The very best mascara for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried many mascaras that cost $25, this is just as good for way less money. I had my daughter try it and now it is also the only mascara she will use. Amazing for only $10. I do not like the waterproof. Accidently got waterproof once and you have to scrub your eyes and use special remover which then prematurely removes lashes. if you really want a waterproof it is butI prefer the non waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: nursemama4

customer_reviews.title: Good, but clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I like how it extends my eye lashes, however, it doesn't seem to keep the curls in my natural eyelashes. It does dry fairly quick so be carefully when applying multiple coats, because it can get pretty clumpy. Not a big fan of the brush shape. I think it's the brush shape/bristles that causes the product to clump together, even prior to drying.
customer_reviews.author: Donuties

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof???
customer_reviews.text: This is no more waterproof than Maybelline which I think is actually better. I am blond and with no mascara I have NO eyelashes. I wish there was an almost permanent mascara. I don't take it off at nite because it takes so long to put it on. I put this one on in the morning before church and by 4pm or so it was all off my bottom lashes, and almost gone from the top too. I'll stick to Maybelline.
customer_reviews.author: Leo F.

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy flaky hard to work with
customer_reviews.text: Worse mascara I've ever tried... Very very clumpy, and it flakes terrible by end of day which really bothers my eyes. Now I have tried other loreal mascara that I like....this was just not for me...it just clumps all my lashes together and it's like impossible to work with.... It took me 20 minutes just fighting with this stuff because it was all I had.... going to the store tonight because this stuff belongs in the trash! Sorry loreal ....not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara, if you can't afford to have lashes put on
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness and length this creates. I have tried many and this is my go to, because it is thickening. However, it doesn't take very long before it has to be replaced, because it dries out quickly in the tube, and gets clumpy. I, also, like the pink primer in the same box and look, but it has the same results, must be replaced quickly. My eye sight isn't as good as it use to be, and the primer lights up the lashes, so that I can apply easily the regular mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Patchouli Patty

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal's Lash Paradise, not so paradisical!
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the descriptive hype! I had high hopes, but, this clumps on your lashes, goes on in lumps and clumps, isn't "feathery soft" in effect, isn't waterproof -- rather it just gets sort of gooey. And, it definitely gets deposited under my eyes during yoga, whereas my old standby, reliable Dior waterproof mascara is much more satisfying to apply, is longer wearing, doesn't become gooey. L'Oreal's Lash Paradise just isn't a paradise, at all!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Was waterproof but could hold curl better
customer_reviews.text: Was waterproof, I’ve worn in almost all day now and it did droop a little and loose the initial curl my lashes had when I curled my lashes and applied the mascara but that’s expected. Would be nice for it to hold. But I mainly got it for the waterproof reason and that it got correct. I have sensitive skin and am often irritated by some mascaras but L’Oréal mascara never bothers me, neither did this one
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Different wands but maybe company changed it?
customer_reviews.text: Well this product is very good and this mascara is my go to for that long natural looking eyelashes but for some reason this mascara crumped a lot. I compared it to my old one that I bought from the store and noticed that the wand was the main difference so I just cleaned the old on and replaced it. I don't know if the company decided to change it or it it is Amazon that made it different. Either way I'ma still use it.
customer_reviews.author: dianamartinez2515

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy but works well with some effort
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is clumpy straight out of the package so you really have to maneuver the brush to avoid getting the huge clump on end of brush on your lashes. However, 2 coats of this (sans clump) looks like 4 coats of my old mascara. But any time saved in application is nullified by the amount of time I spend cleaning the inevitable clumps from kids and lashes
customer_reviews.author: May Latte

customer_reviews.title: Awful for my thinner eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: In addition to this mascara basically clumping my thinner lashes into 5 cartoon looking lash clumps, once i was able to tease my lashes back apart with a clean, dry lash wand, this mascara burned my eyes. Made them tear up terribly. didn't wash off easily with remover, and left dark rubbery smudges under my eyes. i tried for two weeks. Didn't even save this for my emergency car stash - tossed into the bin and went back to Maybeline Mega Plush. This may work perfect for others. Just not right for this thin lashed sensitive gal.
customer_reviews.author: KG_Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Does add volume & length without smudging.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for some years now. Since it came out. Love it. Plus the price is fab. I’ve tried all kinds of stuff. I have long but straight lashes. I have to curl them then I have to use a waterproof mascara so that it doesn’t uncurl my lashes. Found out about this accidentally. One day I bought a waterproof masacra not knowing. Then went back to regular. Noticed that the waterproof formule didn't uncurl my lashes. Amazing hack I discovered. I was pretty lucky that I found it when I still was very young. I’m always asked what mascara do you use. Your lashes look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Flirty Lashes

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara but lengthens more than volumizes
customer_reviews.text: I decided to beach out of my normal L’Oréal volumizing mascara and try this one. The mascara went on great and was still on after my 12 hour shift at work which is a must for me. It stayed so good in place, that i had to remove it with makeup remover x2. It seems like a pretty good product, however there is one thing that bothered me with this mascara. It looked more like a lengthening mascara when applied rather theN the volumizing mascara it is advertised as. For that, I’m giving it 4 stars but it seems like a good product when compared to other mascaras that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: JR Starr

customer_reviews.title: I love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how my eye lashes look with this mascara! It doesn’t flake. It is water proof, so I do like that I can go for a run, and it doesn’t budge! The one bad part is.. since it is waterproof... it is SO difficult to get off even when you are trying! I sometimes pull out several eyelashes trying to get it all off. It’s still my favorite mascara though! And I’ve tried mascaras that cost twice as much and still loveeee this one!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole s.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: You can buy the waterproof version as well. After trying expensive mascaras ....Lancôme...MAC ...Mark Jacob...etc...I care back to this one ...my favorite , I can sleep with it on and my eyelashes look great the next day ....I buy it at CVS as well
customer_reviews.author: Wowo

customer_reviews.title: BEST MASCARA FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara for the price. I’ve tried them all and keep coming back to this one. I e been using it for about a year. The amazon price is better than any retailer I’ve tried. In fact, I’m going to order more right now. I usually do two coats in the morning and it lasts all day. I’m not ok paying $25 for mascara so this is my current fav. The brush is thick and it goes on really smooth. Lashes look very fluffy and thick. I love it. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not the best mascara out there
customer_reviews.text: This is one mascara I won’t buy again. No it doesn’t smudge but either does it come off. I’m literally pulling clumps of mascara from my lashes, which is a pain in the eyelid. The mascara itself clumps my lashes to little sparse spider legs which isn’t the look I was going for. Makes it seem like I have less lashes and the ones I do have are spaced out spikes. I prefer the full lush long lashes that other mascara gives and so I’ll be retracing my orders to find those.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the waterproof version. It creates great volume, length and curl with just 2 coats. I have to use waterproof because of my oily skin and because I love how waterproof olds the curl until you remove the mascara, unlike the washable mascaras. This is very impressive volume for a waterproof mascara since it’s so hard to find waterproof mascaras that add good volume. Best of all, it creates an amazing curl and eye opening effect. This performs so much better than higher end mascaras such as the Diorshow Waterproof Mascara which adds little to no volume. This is a beauty bargain and Jeffree Star approved!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I've read great reviews elsewhere on how it is a dupe of a more expensive brand. Sadly this is not an item I would buy again as it is super clumpy and flakes often. After a few uses the brush becomes s clumped up with product it's almost unusable. It may work better with another brush but that still doesn't fix the fact it flakes.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mascara. It is an extremely close dupe for a far more expensive brand. I love how this makes my lashes look - extremely full, but not too clumpy; almost as if I am wearing false lashes. It is smudge proof and waterproof, however it doesn't tug on or cause my lashes to fall off or anything like that. I have sensitive eyes and this is my go to mascara. I have even slept it it accidentally a few times, and woke up still looking amazing. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Very clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mascara because I liked the look of the brush. Which is great by the way. The mascara however is terrible. Very thick and clumpy! Sometimes it takes a couple of weeks to not be so full and gets better, not this one. I have other Loreal mascara's that I really like but I would not recommend this one. Wish I could get the brush in a different formula.
customer_reviews.author: ZTsMomm

customer_reviews.title: Irritated, very itchy eyes.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very tacky in consistency, you have to apply it quickly or it clumps on you. It did give me big lashes, but they looked a little like spider-legs. The worst part is the reaction my eyes had, my eyes became extremely itchy, tear ducts very red and eyelids swelled. I have used other L'Oreal products in the past and not had adverse reactions, however, even when I washed this off my eyes stung/itched for about an hour after.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, effective mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I don't use a lot of makeup but I do like to have mascara around that is effective. This formula elongates your lashes considerably, separates them well, and looks great all day. It doesn't wear off or get smudgy during the day, and it washes off with soap and water, or oil cleanser. I love how long it makes my lashes, and it applies well. Don't over-apply, or it will get a little heavy/thick, and not look as good on your lashes. Just give them a few good swipes with the applicator brush, and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Adds volume and length but clumpy
customer_reviews.text: This makes such a noticeable difference. I love how bold and voluminous it comes out. It is comparable to some other more expensive mascara products i've used but at a fraction of the cost. For what it's worth this is probably my go to. I bumped down to 4 stars just because it does get clumpy so it just makes it that much harder to apply a nice even coat.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT get waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara because it really adds length and volume, and doesn't come off easily. I hate this mascara because it won't come off at all. 2 showers later, makeup wipes, tons of soap, micellar water, and oil and it will NOT come off. It's been days. I've never seen anything like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bessie Parr

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I hate drug store mascara
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this product and will continue to buy it. It is a perfect dupe for the too faced better than sex. If you’re looking for super huge dramatic lashes I would use a primer first. But I like using it just as is for every day wear. I will continue to buy this probably forever. I would also suggest the Tarte Maneater mascara as well if you like both of these mascaras.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars. Good for drug store brand. Nice brush.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara didn’t smudge and was easy enough to remove but didn’t have the volume effect on me that other people are saying. I usually use Better Than Sex and saw a review that said this mascara was as good as that brand, if not better. I have to disagree, but it did work well for a drug store product and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spyke

customer_reviews.title: Not a dupe
customer_reviews.text: This was touted to be a dupe for a couple higher end brands TF/Stila- but there's no comparison. My lashes are sticky and gross--but I can't even justify that as the result even with a couple coats is nowhere near what better brands can do. Also, I've ruined 2 sets of contracts in just 2 days because somehow it flaked off and won't clean off. This isn't my first time with mascara so I know how to apply and not get in my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Might be Good
customer_reviews.text: This mascara looks like it might be good, if it were fresh. It was pretty well dried out when I received it and now @ 3 weeks later, it is done. The brush has a nice design and with a little zig Zag motion you can get nice long think looking lashes. The product does not seem to smudge, and it comes off easier than most. I would love to have had a free tube. I would maybe buy it again but will buy from a local retailer so that I can return it if it is old.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Clump city! Garbage not paradise
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 is it's truely waterproof, smudge proof and sweat proof, which I what to do I wanted. However, when you take the spooly out of the tube, it comes out caked in mascara and no amkou t of scraping it on the sides helps unclump it from the bristles. Then when you put it on your lashes... OMG! It made my lashes look jagged and the more I tried to correct it the more the clumps on the tips of my lashes got worse until the looked like itty bitty spoons. Seriously disappointed in the design of the tube's lack of rim top scraping O-ring.
customer_reviews.author: LahrCat

customer_reviews.title: You will never, ever get it off
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought the waterproof version of this, which is my favorite mascara. Unless you have several hours to chisel away at your mascara when it’s time to remove, I’d suggest going with something else. Makeup remover, coconut oil, face wash, jackhammer....nothing makes this mascara budge. And if you need to reapply the next day, your lashes will be clumpy and hard from what you were too tired to scrub off the night before. There’s waterproof...and then there’s this.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: Stings your eyes unlike other mascaras
customer_reviews.text: It does lengthen nicely but damn...stings like heck when you need to remove it. My daughter and I both used an expensive makeup remover and it was the same fit both, stung our eyes. It is so hard to get it off that I thought my eyeball was about to pop out, glass eye here I come...so yea, won’t be using it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara product I've tried!!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is amazing!! It actually is waterproof! It volumizes!! It is amazing. With all the girls having long lashes going around and me being too cheap to pay 200 every 2 months for extensions I needed a way around it. I ordered this along with the volumizing primer, same brand and the two together-they keep on my lashes! Even after a shower! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: I am in love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite mascara. I have been using a high end,department store brand for over a year now that costs about $24. I decided to try this one,to see how it compares. What I like in a mascara is one that coats my lashes very well and is buildable. This one does exactly that. I love love love the brush that it has,because it applies the product to my lashes so well. Such a great price too. It never ever flakes off either. I also bought the waterproof one and am equally as happy with that one. Highly recommend trying this mascara! I will keep repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: RLH

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this today and 2 people complimented my lashes and asked if I was using a new mascara. I've been using it for about 2 weeks now. No smudging, running, etc. I prefer waterproof mascara because I think it helps my lashes hold curl better; however, waterproof mascara is always difficult to remove. I think this one wipes away easier than most. I'm really enjoying it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Worse mascara I ever tried :-(
customer_reviews.text: Product claims: L'Oreal Paris Voluminous Makeup Lash Paradise Mascara, Voluptuous Volume, Intense Length, Feathery Soft Full Lashes, No Flaking, No Smudging, No Clumping, Blackest Black Actual product review: some volume, not any lengthier then great lashes or Absolutely NOT FEATHERY or SOFT. By far the clumpiest mascara I have ever tried. I used it 3 times thinking it was just new. It was like a dried up muddy, very clumpy mess. When I applied it, I had to spend several minutes to remove clumps & try to feather with a eye lash separator. Never used my eyelash curler, afraid it would smudge everything and stick together. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy JonesJones

customer_reviews.title: I'm throwing away my mascara collection now
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mascara collector. I didn't mean to become one - but I did. Probably every brand at the drugstore is in my makeup bag, but no longer... I'm throwing them all away for good. THIS IS, BY FAR, THE BEST DRUGSTORE BRAND MASCARA EVER! My lashes haven't seen lengths like this in FOREVER. Lash Paradise and a eye lash curler = FLAWLESS. I'm so impressed. How many in the collection will be hitting the trash? EIGHT. So HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: WendyAF

customer_reviews.title: Lash Paradise is my favorite, BUT only the waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite mascara, hands down! BUT...only in the waterproof formula! It stays, keeps my lashes curled, doesn’t clump or flake on me and I LIVE how it makes my lashes look! I’m sadly disappointed in the primer and regular formula that came in this package but. I wound up giving the mascara to my daughter. I really wanted to like both, but the primer and non-waterproof formula both cause the curl to go right out of my lashes. They grow long, but they’re stick-straight, and I always have to use a curler. Waterproof Lash Paradise is my Holy Grail product!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry T.

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves!
customer_reviews.text: I saw some good reviews for this mascara and I thought about giving this to mom. My mother loves it and says it’s like a chanel mascara she used before. She also said that it’s less clumpy and more elongating than the covergirl mascara she usually buys. Although she said it’s not as long wearing and not as thickening as the Covergirl. So I guess it’s up to you on what you want out of your mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Jack c.

customer_reviews.title: SMUDGES AND GLOPS
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before deciding to purchase this mascara. I was hoping for something that wouldn't smudge or make my lashes look gloppy. Unfortunately, this mascara did both. :( Very disappointed! I have no idea how this gets so many high marks. I wouldn't repurchase or recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Nice mascara
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to 100% love this mascara, but one thing holds me back and that's the huge brush. I have short, blonde eyelashes so keep that in mind. The large brush makes it difficult to reach every single lash. It IS smudge proof though. Keep this all in mind. Otherwise, it's a nice mascara that doesn't break the budget.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality brush
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product as a friend had recommended. It truly creates a very pretty lash affect but the brush is difficult to return to the tube and bends easily....to a point I felt it would break. Hope this brush strength can be improved upon or maybe the opening to the tube can be enlarged to accommodate it more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Voluminous Makeup Lash Paradise Mascara, Voluptuous Volume, Intense Length, Feathery Soft Full Lashes, No Flaking, No Smudging, No Clumping, Blackest Black, 1 Count
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 1| Color:Washable Blackest BlackTake your lashes to paradise! Our 1st mascara for voluptuous volume and length. Soft wavy bristle brush holds maximum formula for a dramatic volumizing charge. 200+ bristles catch every lash for a full fringe effect. Smooth glide formula provides silky volume in one coat. Lashes are feathery soft to the touch. Women agreed: 91% saw intense and volumized lashes and 87% saw more beautiful lashes. +98% lengthening effect.

Voluptuous Volume and Length
Full Lash Fringe, Feathery Soft
Soft Wavy Bristle Brush
Smooth Glide Formula

Place brush at base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. Removes easily with soap and water. 

To safeguard L’Oreal Purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.
feature_bullets: Volumizing and lengthening mascara: This volumizing and lengthening mascara delivers a full lash fringe that’s feathery soft, with no flaking, no smudging, and no clumping. Just voluptuous volume and intense length
L'oreal paris mascara: Get the long, full eyelashes you love with our best mascaras and primers. Choose from our innovative volumizing formulas and variety of brushes

Create your perfect eye makeup look with our collection of Voluminous mascaras, achieve sleek lines with smudge-proof eyeliner, define your brows and discover eyeshadow palettes with shades made for every eye color

Because you're worth it: L'Oreal Paris Makeup helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks and much more

Perfect to pair with: L'Oreal Paris Infallible Never Fail Mechanical Pencil Eyeliner. With long-lasting, fade-proof color, Infallible Never Fail Eyeliner ensures your look stays put for up to 16 hours

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
